official_title: Authorizes the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 14883) to make certain changes in the engrossed House amendment to the Senate amendment.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 14883 to make specified changes in the engrossed House amendment to the Senate amendment.

titles.title: Authorizes the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 14883) to make certain changes in the engrossed House amendment to the Senate amendment.
